content.rendered:
Introducing our newest additional, our petite orchid plant, a touch of nature’s beauty in a petite size. Perfect for thoughtful gifting, whether expressing gratitude to our beloved teachers or honouring a valued corporate connection, it conveys appreciation through its graceful presence.

Each mini orchid plant is carefully selected personally by us, then potted into a white ceramic planter, finished with moss and trailing ribbon, and elegantly presented in a gift box for delivery.

We locally source our range of mini phalaenopsis orchid plants from premium plant nurseries.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The mini orchid plant you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Petite vase size: 16cm H x 11cm W approx.

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
